Title: Flex-like DataGrid custom control for C# .Net 2.0
Description: This project hosts a DataGrid custom control which mocks the Flex DataGrid in looks and a bit in behavior. The DataGrid also exposes new properties to customize the colors and fonts.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project hosts a DataGrid custom control which mocks the Flex DataGrid in looks and a bit in behavior. The DataGrid also exposes new properties to customize the colors and fonts.
Built on C# .Net 2.0 , it can be a good alternative to the regular datagrid.
